name: Green Hell VR
storyline:
You, the anthropologist, set a camp amid the Amazon rainforest. You are looking for a special herb which, according to some legends, can be found only on the land of the Waraha tribe. The herb could be a cure to almost any disease and, in particular, help your wife fight off the cancer that is killing her.

But something went wrong and you find yourself stranded in the dangerous jungle, surrounded by predators with only your trusty smartwatch, backpack and the survival guide grabbed just before leaving home.
summary:
Green Hell VR is an Open World Survival Experience set in the Amazon rainforest, based on a successful PC game Green Hell.​ You are left alone in the jungle with no food or equipment. To survive, you must learn specific survival techniques like building shelters and making tools. Also, crafting weapons to hunt and defend can be a matter of life and death.

The game faithfully recreates the dangerous conditions of the Amazon Jungle. You will have to face your weaknesses, as well as hunger, thirst, fatigue, wild animal attacks, tropical diseases and deteriorating mental health.
